recipe.description: A cool way to make a sweet summer treat!
ingredients: 16 oz bag of broccoli florets, washed
1/4 cup finely chopped walnuts or pecans
instructions: Mix together in a large the mayonaise, honey, and vinegar until well blended.
Add in the florets, cranberries, bacon, and cheese. Mix together until everything is well coated.
Chill in the refrigerator for 30 minutes. Stir and then serve.
